entry.title: Grand Agent: It Call
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 2.00 â†’ å…è²» [å…è²» ~ HK$Â 8.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šå…è²»

App å…§è³¼è²·é …ç›®

  • Diamondsï¼šHK$Â 118.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies. The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats. By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end. During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle. As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft. This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

entry.title: Stop&Get Away From Me! Defense
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 2.00 â†’ å…è²» [å…è²» ~ HK$Â 8.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šå…è²»

App å…§è³¼è²·é …ç›®

  • Diamondsï¼šHK$Â 118.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game. ### Gameplay #### Click the screen to fire The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials. #### Dynamic aiming and reaction Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy. #### Easy restart, continuous challenge The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game. #### Unique and interesting painting style The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment. #### Endless challenges and fun Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting. In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

entry.title: YÅkai Retreat SP Yin Yang-Sama
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 2.00 â†’ å…è²» [å…è²» ~ HK$Â 88.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šå…è²»

App å…§è³¼è²·é …ç›®

  • Diamondsï¼šHK$Â 22.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl. The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward. In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters. As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.

entry.title: myLightMeter PRO
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 38.00 â†’ HK$Â 32.00 [HK$Â 32.00 ~ HK$Â 38.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 32.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Designed by a photographer for photographers, focused on RELIABILITY and PRECISION for digital and analog photography. â€¢ Extended sensitivity as low as -2/-4EV (dark scenes) â€¢ Two different convenient interface designs. â€¢ Incident and reflected light metering modes. â€¢ Save exposure data. â€¢ f/Tools connection. â€¢ Independent calibration for the two metering modes. â€¢ Independent selection of aperture, speed, ISO and exposure compensation with 1/3 resolution. From 4 hours to 1/8000 sec., aperture from 1.0 to 512 and ISO from 0.8 to 6400. â€¢ Automatic priority for aperture or speed. (Automatic Av and Tv modes). â€¢ Automatic ISO or locked ISO options. â€¢ Point metering in camera view. â€¢ Maximum aperture limited by the selected lens. â€¢ Calculate the average of any number of measurements you want. â€¢ Read the exposure data of any photo from the gallery. â€¢ Calculate hyperfocal distance for 5 memorized lenses. Which also blocks maximum aperture. â€¢ Memory for 5 lenses with maximum aperture, focal length and film/sensor size for calculating hyperfocal distance and aperture. â€¢ Hyperfocal distance also for infrared light. (IR button) â€¢ Exposure value EV on an analog scale or right up front. â€¢ On 3.5 " displays preset lens buttons tilting the device or tapping at the bottom. â€¢ Be advised that accurate incident light reading needs a diffuser attached to the front camera. Without the diffuser still can be used but think about it, it will be a reflected reading taken with the front camera. I'm an independent photographer/designer/developer and am very grateful for your support. Trying to do the best lightmeter app ever, a lot more to come. You can ask for any improvement and I'll be happy to help. This app is constantly reviewed and improved because it is my tool, if you have any questions or suggestions feel free to contact me by email at davidquiles@me.com Thank you! David Quiles

This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials. #### Dynamic aiming and reaction Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy. #### Easy restart, continuous challenge The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game. #### Unique and interesting painting style The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment. #### Endless challenges and fun Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting. In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

entry.title: Grand Agent: It Call
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 6.00 â†’ å…è²» [å…è²» ~ HK$Â 6.00]ï¼‰

App å…§è³¼è²·é …ç›®

  • Diamondsï¼šHK$Â 118.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies. The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats. By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end. During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle. As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft. This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness. The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Allianceâ€™s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods. Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright. The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

Start new musical ideas with a curated selection of sounds and effects. Create beats and melodic parts, sample your world, and continue your tracks in Ableton Live. Note is a place to form ideas, explore new sounds and find direction. Get your ideas out or just experiment until inspiration hits, using a selection of Ableton Liveâ€™s drum kits, synths and melodic instruments. Create your own sound palette by sampling with your phoneâ€™s built-in microphone. And use Noteâ€™s built-in MIDI Editor to sequence notes, beats and chords or make tweaks as you listen back Follow your ideas wherever they lead by sending your projects to Live without leaving the app with the help of Ableton Cloud. Open projects from Liveâ€™s browser and keep working â€“ you can edit all your MIDI notes, and all your samples and sounds from Note are exactly the same. Ableton Note users get a free license for Ableton Live Lite â€“ simple, intuitive software used by musicians, producers and DJs around the world to write, record, and perform. For Ableton Move users, Note also offers the chance to keep working on a Set from your phone. Begin with a beat: â€¢ Choose from 76 Drum Sampler kits â€¢ Tap out a beat using the 16-pad grid, or sequence one with the MIDI Editor â€¢ Play each drum hit melodically using 16 Pitches mode â€¢ Quantize your beat or nudge notes to fix loose timing or mistakes â€¢ Add more layers of rhythm â€¢ Create beat repetitions with Note Repeat â€¢ Change parameters to shape your sound â€¢ Experiment with effects or apply swing for variations Start with a melody: â€¢ Choose from 317 synth sounds and 60 Melodic Sampler instruments â€¢ Play or program your melody or chord progression with the 25-pad Driving Zone: Germany Pro - car game and street racing simulator without ads and limits. Drive with realistic physics and legendary german cars. In this game are presented cars prototypes of the German manufacturers: from classic city cars to powerful modern sports cars and luxury cars. Each car in the game has it's own technical specifications and engine sounds. Well detailed body and dashboard create the effect of full presence and realism. The game offers four unique tracks with different weather conditions. You can drive on high-speed highway, or go for a ride in the German town, which is particularly beautiful at night. If you are a real extreme racer, you should drive on winter track with dangerous icy road. You can choose the starting time of the day, that will change dynamically. You can also try driving on special race or drift track. Start the engine, press down on the gas and chase as quickly as possible. Earn points by overtaking traffic cars. Or go to the race track and try to pass it by shortest time for take maximum reward. Another mode is drift, where you can test your skills of drifting and earn points by fast and sharp skid angles. You will need points to open the new vehicles, modes and other features of the game. This racing simulator gives you the ability to choose the style of driving that can be quiet and safe or extremely dangerous racing. The abundance of settings allows you to customize a level of car physics realism, from arcade and simulation levels to the most realistic, as in the difficult racing simulator in which you will need to show your driving skills. Features: - No ads. - Modern beautiful graphics; - Car tuning and customization feature; - Realistic car physics; - Change the time of day in real-time; - 4 levels for street racing, many configurations of racetracks and drift tracks with different weather conditions; - First person view / Interior view / Cinematic camera; - Automatic cloud synchronization of your game progress. Warning! This game is quite realistic, but it is not designed to teach you how to street racing. Be careful and responsible when you're driving real car. Enjoy virtual driving in heavy car traffic, but please observe the traffic rules and be careful on real roads.

SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Donâ€™t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009. Here's whatâ€™s new in version 7: + Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience. + Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions. + Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device. + Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari. Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer. These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices. SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people. OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time. This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object. SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts. + Sky Tonight - jump to the new Tonight section to see whatâ€™s visible in your sky tonight. Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects. + Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations. New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data. + Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips. The Small Touches: + You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings. + Better Moon Age calculation. + New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines. + Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free - this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy. + Many more. If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it: + Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more! + Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events. + Control your telescope, log and plan your observations. + Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com. + Augmented Reality (AR) mode + Night Vision. + Orbit Mode. Leave the Earthâ€™s surface behind, and fly through our solar system. + Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way! https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game. ### Gameplay #### Click the screen to fire The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials. #### Dynamic aiming and reaction Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy. #### Easy restart, continuous challenge The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game. #### Unique and interesting painting style The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment. #### Endless challenges and fun Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting. In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl. The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward. In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters. As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.
